decision_conditions: <p><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;"><span style="font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">The total noise level from fixed plants shall be 10 dB(A) or more below the measured LA90 level at the nearest noise sensitive premises at any time. The method of assessment shall be carried in accordance with. BS4142: 2014:</span><span style="font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound.&nbsp; Before commencement of the use hereby permitted a test shall be carried out to show that the above criterion shall be met and the results submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval</span><span style="font-size: 14px;">)&nbsp;</span></span><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">Anti-vibration mounts shall be fitted to the approved ducting and any associated equipment
as required, and details shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority in
writing. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in
accordance with the details thus approved and shall remain in&nbsp;<span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">perpetuity.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-d812391f-7fff-263d-0860-9e80f925f5af"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">:</span><span style="font-size: 13pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"> </span><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">To ensure that there is no noise disturbance to surrounding occupiers</span></span><br></p>

<p>Detailed drawings and/or full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters
set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing,
prior to the relevant part of works. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in
accordance with the details thus approved which shall be implemented in full prior to the first
use of the development and retained in perpetuity. </p><p>a) Details and specifications of materials to
be used in the shop front </p><p>b) 1:20 elevations internal and external and 1:5 sections through the
proposed shop front </p><p>c) Details of roller shutter&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To ensure the development safeguards the character and
appearance of the host building and Conservation Area.<br></p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
description: Replacement of existing shop front with new shop front and new extract flue to rear elevation
subdivision_of_building: Proposal includes ground floor level and basement level only.
